title: Choozy Doozy: Celebrity
description: The #1 family show of 2025! Every week it’s the same goddamn thing. It’s guy on guy, girl on girl. Sometimes it’s even guy on girl.
quote: You chooze it, you dooze it!
alt3: Choozilator poll board choosing from: eat a bunch of waffles, f*** a dude, Juggle knives, and swallow a watch
alt4: Lou Dorchen in a jump suit and VR gogles being electrocuted
tags: game shows with a bit of danger!
